summary: Set up CI/CD pipeline to automatically publish TypeScript SDK packages to npm. Needs decisions on publish trigger, version bumping strategy, and changelog generation.
userImpact: Without automated publishing, SDK releases require manual steps, slowing down release cycles and increasing error risk.
proposedFix: Implement CI/CD workflow with decisions on: publish on main branch merge, version bump strategy (patch/minor/major), and auto-generated changelogs using lerna-changelog.
keyQuote: Need to first consider: When to publish packages (on merge to main?), Which version to bump: patch, minor, major?
